Section.name: About MIC College of Technology
Section.description:
Devineni Venkata Ramana & Dr. Hima Sekhar MIC College of Technology was established in 2002 at Krishna District, Andhra Pradesh. The College is approved by AICTE and affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Kakinada. MIC College of Technology provides undergraduate (UG) program in B.Tech and post graduate (PG) programme in M.Tech.
MIC College of Technology AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
